name: The Last of Dingus
description:
Roguelike set in space. 

Scavenge areas in search of resources as brave spaceman Jole Dingus! Watch out for those nasty alien shrooms though! They will try to eat you! As you hoard your items, you will be able to pick bonuses each day to grow in strength!

Controls :

WSAD - movement

Mouse - look around

Left Mouse Button - fire

Right Mouse Button - punch

0 / Mouse Wheel - change weapons

F - flashlight on / off

J - use fuel pack to restore ammo

H - use med kit to restore health

T - turn tutorial on / off
